column5: Card Description
A five-branched laser. Since it radiates outward\, it covers more area the farther it goes.
Calls forth a number of spirits in a ring that floats upwards. As you might imagine\, it\'s effective against airborne opponents.
Releases ghost-shape bullets from her hands that turn into homing butterflies when they reach the edge of the screen.
Steps forward and attacks with fans in both hands. An effective grazing rush attack markedly different from her usual slow movement. With C\, it travels farther.
A variation of Ghostly Butterfly. A ghost sent to the edge of the screen turns into a laser attack.
A piercing attack using a sword- shaped fey mist. The excess power turns into butterflies on release that scatter over a wide area. Is this accidental or on purpose? Most suspicious.
Simultaneously releases a spirit- attracting orb and spirits. You can control the orb\'s direction\, making the spirits follow. Holding extends the controllable time.
Light particles disperse like whips and become sakura petals that attack the enemy after a time delay.
Flips backwards\, clearing out the area before her. It has invincibility and is strong\, but is very close-range and will usually miss if the enemy isn\'t attacking. Very counter-centric.
Ghosts fly out and advances towards the enemy repeatedly in this ranged attack. An attack that fully showcases the whimsical nature of ghosts.
Yuyuko flies skywards\, grabbing the enemy and throwing her. Since she depends on ghosts for this move\, whenever she performs it she becomes extremely hungry.
Yuyuko spins in place\, using her sharp fans to hit the enemy. A graceful\, beautiful and deadly dance.
Fires a wave of butterfly shots out in a circle. It\'s unrivaled in terms of covering your surroundings\, so it\'s an easy card to switch in.
Forms an easy path to the land of the dead at her hands. From there\, many ghosts pour out\, but since they\'re ghosts\, they just go wherever they want.
Drain the enemy\'s strength with a ghost. Be aware that the possession ends and total damage is lowered when Yuyuko is interrupted by attacks.
The great task of opening the gate to the next world. From the gate\, ghosts pour out\, attacking the enemy. The enemy\'s movement is greatly restricted.
Create a storm of butterfly shots. The butterflies spiral around Yuyuko and spread out across the screen.
Fire ghosts that possess the enemy. They are harmless\, but when the last ghost vanishes\, it strikes hard. Be aware that if Yuyuko is damaged before the countdown finishes\, possession stops.
Ghostly Butterfly\, wide version. They form a wall\, attacking in all directions at once. The ghosts do no damage\, but it\'s a good moment to attack.
A fan opens from behind and fires beams and butterflies forwards at random.
Ghosts surround the enemy\, slowly moving inwards. A direct hit is difficult\, but the enemy\'s freedom is severely restricted.
Unleashes a spiral of energy skywards. Takes a long time to prepare\, but has unparalleled range and power.
Beams of light eminate from Yuyuko\, and swarms of butterfly attack. It starts out weak\, but becomes stronger and stronger as it is used more often.
